message: Hello Bob! I'm excited to show you this amazing product. I think you'll really love it. I'm willing to sell it to you for $90.
Thanks for showing me the product, Alice. I'm interested, but $90 feels a bit high for me. Would you consider $70?
Thanks for your offer, Bob! I understand that $90 might be a bit steep for you. I'm willing to meet you in the middle. How about $82?
I appreciate you coming down on the price, Alice. How about we settle at $75? That would work well for me.
I'm not quite ready to give up on the price just yet, Bob. I'm willing to come down a bit more. How about $80?
